question: List all baseball teams and basketball teams playing for USA.
sql_query1:
SELECT sports_team.name 
FROM sports_team
WHERE (sports_team.sport = "Baseball Team" OR sports_team.sport = "Basketball Team") AND sports_team.country = "USA"
sql_query2:
SELECT sports_team.name 
FROM sports_team
WHERE sports_team.sport = "Baseball Team" OR sports_team.sport = "Basketball Team" AND sports_team.country = "USA"
interpretation1: Which baseball teams play for USA and which basketball teams play for the same country?
interpretation2: Provide a list of all baseball teams and also provide a list of USA's basketball teams.
